name: name (needs to be unique)
description: description. For variables (values affected by actions) use $[offensive|defensive][health|maxHealth|guard] like that: $oh $om $og $dh $dm $dh

comment.explanation: following list is an explanation of each effect in cardAction:
comment.bypass: A boolean value, if true HP damage ignores guard.
comment.chain: A string value, if player has card of this name in deck or hand, play it immediately. (for enemy if it was not played last turn).
comment.burn: A boolean value, if true remove this card from deck instead of moving it to discar pile after playing.
